Translations.Text: Dir My Lord Vi montr me (retribution) ili incurred
My Lord let me ne est unu de transgressing popol
Al montr vi (retribution) ni rezerv them est io ni easily do
Do counter their evil works goodness; ni est fully aware da their pretend
Dir My Lord mi streb rifugx Vi el flustr diabl
Mi streb rifugx en Vi my Lord lest ili ven me
When death ven 1 de them li dir My Lord send me
Mi tiam work righteousness cxio mi las. Ne ver! This est false pretend li far. barrier separate his anim this mond resurrection
When korn ne blov relations them ekzist ke tag nor vol ili zorg 1 another
As por those weights est heavy ili est winners
Those weights est light est unu perd their anim; ili abide Infer forever
Fajr overwhelm their vizagx ili last miserably therein
Ne est My revelations recited vi vi kept rejecting them
Ili dir Our Lord our wickedness overwhelmed us ni popol ir astray
(Our Lord pren us out da this; se ni return our old behavior) tiam ni est really wicked
Li dir Abide therein humiliated ne parol al Me
Grup My servants uz dir â€˜Our Lord ni kred tial forgive us dusx us kun mercy! De all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
Vi mok ridiculed them extent ke vi forges Me Vi uz rid them
Mi rekompenc them hodiaux dors their steadfastness far them winners
Li dir "Kiel long vi last ter? Kiel many jar
Ili dir Ni last tag part de tag! Pet those counted
Li dir En fakt, vi rest brief interim vi nur kon
Vi opini ni Did kre vi en vain vi ne est returned us
exalted est DI prav Suveren! tie ne est ali di Him; plej Honorable Lord possessor all auxtoritat
Anyone idolizes DI any ali di any kind da proof li reckoning ripoz his Lord disbelievers neniam sukces
Dir My Lord dusx us forgiveness mercy! De all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
